                  br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d.CameraController
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Layout
public class CameraController
extends FixedObject

Non implemented 2D object, used during the development and included here for purposes of documentation only. A CameraController object is an arrow pointing either to the right or left, moving the camera to the specified direction. It has been replaced by the A-D keys and scrolling on the Map2D due to usability decisions.
